data.title: 66% of Americans want European-style vacation policies, like being OOO for the entire month of August
data.description: The average American is lucky to get 11 vacation days from their employer each year.

data.title: Starbucks told to pay $2.7 million more to ex-manager awarded $25.6 million over firing
data.description: In June, Shannon Phillips won $600,000 in compensatory damages and $25 million in punitive damages after a jury found that race was a factor in Phillips' firing.

data.title: Amazon deforestation at six-year-low in Brazil after plunging 66% in July
data.description: Deforestation in the Brazilian Amazon fell by 66% last month compared to July 2022 and is now at its lowest rate in six years, according to preliminary data released by Brazil's National Institute for Space Research (INPE) on Thursday.
